channel.title: CVE Feed for Odoo -- Odoo Enterprise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Odoo -- Odoo Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2021-44461|2024-07-15T14:56:28.883Z -- odoo -- odoo%20enterprise
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) issue in Accounting app of Odoo Enterprise 13.0 through 15.0, allows remote attackers who are able to control the contents of accounting journal entries to inject arbitrary web script in the browser of a victim.
